1918: This Section shall cover, in accordance with the Indemnity Agreement, Damage to any of the Property Insured for which a Limit of Indemnity is stated in the Schedule. The Company will pay to the Insured the values of such property at the time of the Damage or the amount of the Damage or at the Company’s option reinstate or replace such Property Insured or any part thereof. Provided that the liability of the Company during any Period of Insurance shall in no case exceed, in respect of each Item, the Limit of Indemnity in the Schedule.
